title: Large-Scale Peer Collaboration-Based Mnemonic Workshop for Understanding Pathology

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Medical Terminology and Biological Concepts
context.additional_context: A basic pathology education course for the general public. Requires a stepwise approach considering learners with limited digital tool proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively develop five or more mnemonic devices to explain histopathological concepts with peers.
Learners can analyze, evaluate, and provide feedback on peers' mnemonic devices in shared digital documents.
Learners can accurately interpret three or more real pathological cases (e.g., tissue slides) using mnemonic devices.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
